meanings.definition: In a conical shape or manner.
meanings.sent1: The rocket flew conically through the sky.
meanings.sent2: She placed the ice cream conically on top of the cone.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced conically around the circus tent, entertaining the children.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts spiraled conically towards a singular conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The water flowed conically down the drain, disappearing into the darkness.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cone.
meanings.sent1: The conically shaped hat sat perfectly on her head.
meanings.sent2: He studied the conically tapered structure of the volcano.
meanings.sent3: The conically decorated cake looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The conically stacked cups formed a precarious tower.
meanings.sent5: The conically shadowed area provided a cool spot to rest under the tree.
